#core-features

Not added, but unified

Transforming alignment complexity into one simple control

4-Axis Integrated Control Platform

By unifying four axes ‚Äî X, Y, Pitch, and Roll ‚Äî into a single control system, we have simplified the complex alignment process.

2Œºm Precision

Maintains 2Œºm-level parallel precision and guarantees repeatability even under heavy loads of several hundred kilograms.

Correction Within 2 Seconds

Automatically detects alignment conditions and completes simultaneous correction of all axes within 2 seconds.

Real-Time Interference Compensation

An embedded algorithm detects and corrects axis interference in real time, ensuring precise alignment.

Scalable Architecture

An evolutionary design expandable to the Z and Yaw axes, ready to meet future requirements.

World's First Technology

As the world's first four-axis synchronized alignment platform, it delivers truly innovative technology.

#live-demo

Real-Time Four-Axis Alignment Demo

QuadAlign X detects positional errors in real time and automatically calculates and controls all four axes simultaneously.

This process is completed with a single command ‚Äî without repeated adjustments ‚Äî while maintaining precision and repeatability even under high loads, ensuring angle axes remain stable.

#roadmap

From Two Axes to a New Standard in Alignment Control

QuadAlign X is not a two-axis extension. Centered on Pitch and Roll, it revolutionizes control with real-time multi-axis compensation. BlueRobot is evolving this into a six-axis intelligent alignment system.

Alignment is no longer about matching points ‚Äî it must become the technology that redesigns the process.
